title: Vale Faces Renewed Safety Concerns After Mine Water Overflows
description: Brazilian iron ore miner Vale SA confirmed a second water overflow happened over the weekend at its operations in Minas Gerais, a state hit by dam collapses in 2015 and 2019.
content: Brazilian iron ore miner Vale SA confirmed a second water overflow happened over the weekend at its operations in Minas Gerais, a state hit by dam collapses in 2015 and 2019.
